author: simel
title: Supply chains for industry 5.0
description: Today's global trade is complex and costly. Efficient coordination, security and reliable data are required for their proper operation.
solution: SIMEL connects companies and institutions to Cardano's blockchain network. The result is a better, faster and more cost-efficient trade.
experience: With experience in the international logistics sector, our small team is composed of four professionals located in different countries.
